Title: What Puts You on That Ledge
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Eduardo Javier Canto, Ryan Maldonado, Cole Maliska (story editor), Mike Batistick (story editor), Mo Masi (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Sophia Bush, Jesse Lee Soffer
Plot: Antonio heads undercover with a dangerous robbery crew after a narcotics officer goes missing. Commander Fischer updates Voight on a missing officer that Narcotics had deep undercover with ...
